name: CHOMP
messages: You sting %s with your bug-laden tail

name: Critical Fang Bite
messages: You deliver a wicked bite to %s

name: Critical Fang Bite With Raptor Muzzle
messages: You deliver a ferocious bite to %s

name: Fang Bite
messages: You bite %s and thrash around wildly

name: Critical Fang Bite With Long Muzzle
messages: You bite %s and twist around in a death roll
<npcname> bites %s and twists around in a death roll!

name: Fangs Bite with Lupine Muzzle
//: Enemy must be of a similar size, logically trippable, and not flying.

name: Lucky Fangs Bite with Lupine Muzzle
//: Sometimes we can still get lucky and down fliers or big boys.

name: Critical Fangs Bite With Ursine Muzzle
Critical Folding Fang Bite
messages: You deliver a wicked bite to %s

name: Critical Vampire Bite
messages: You sink your fangs deep into %s!

name: Critical Shark Teeth Bite
messages: You rip into %s with your shark teeth
<npcname> rips into %s with their shark teeth!

name: Incisors Bite with Rat Muzzle or Rabbit Nose
Critical Beak Bite
messages: You deliver a crushing bite to %s

name: Critical Beak Bite With Mouth Tentacles
messages: You latch on and deliver a crushing bite to %s
<npcname> latches on and delivers a crushing bite to %s!
